content: Does anyone know of a module that allows users to select an image style or picture mapping for an image that is inserted into content with CKEditor?

Closest I know of is https://github.com/backdrop-contrib/insert but that works by inserting an image from an image field, not using CKEditor's images...

There is a core issue for this feature though: https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues/2658

backdrop-contrib/insert
A Backdrop CMS port of drupal.org/project/insert, a utility that makes inserting images and links to files into text areas or WYSIWYGs much easier. - backdrop-contrib/insert
[D8] CKEditor: Allow Image Styles to be used with inline images · Issue #2658 · backdrop/backdrop-issues
This is basically the respective issue for what is being worked on for D8 core here: https://www.drupal.org/project/drupal/issues/2061377 This is part of #1087 and #378, and related to #2841 Origin...
Thanks. I'll take a look at the issue and see if I can get something working for core.

I have a problem with image style images not appearing in the Styleguide module: https://github.com/backdrop-contrib/styleguide/issues/14

Image styles not generated automatically · Issue #14 · backdrop-contrib/styleguide
The images in the styleguide aren't generated automatically, in that they don't appear by default, only after I visit each style's configuration page (e.g. /admin/config/media/image-sty...
The only way I can get images to appear initially is to visit the image style configuration pages. Then they work. But before that, no amount of refreshing or clearing of caches works...
Is there a way Styleguide should be generating images/URLs, or is this just a bug with core?
